[bq="SeraphimDawn"]Free markets resemble the ecology of the earth doesn't it?
Where profits are the nutrients. And different ecology have different demands. [/bq]

Basically Mickey runs all of Disney and he is the biggest piece of living garbage ever.

He has Oswald chained up to his wall and feeds him like a pet.

He has a stuffed Pluto near his desk.

He made clones of Minnie mouse because after the original died of disease after he made her turn into a prostitute for money.

He Had sex with Donald and Goofy's Wife. "And Donald himself"

He was in a church and was talking to Goofy very loud and vulgar and told them after they told him to be quite to "Get back to your fairy tails" 

He literally Owns everything and buys everything he doesn't and is just overall a dictator.

Also He sends people to _Disney Concentration Camps_ where they get brained washed into obeying his will if need be!

I made an Evil Dictator Mickey!

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577d54b636872049f0022ec#post_5577d54b636872049f0022ec
That's also why all forms of communism fail always, be it economic communism, cultural communism or so forth; it would be like saying that all forms of life on earth eat the same thing.

If you gave carnivores a all vegan diet they would starve to death; if you gave only meat to herbivores they would malnurish to death.

topics.body:
"Hey, I wanna ask..."
"Huh?"
"If the world ended, where would you go?"
"What do you mean 'where would I go'?"
"I mean exactly that! Where would you go?"
"How can I go anywhere? The world ended. There wouldn't be a place to go."
"I mean, like the end of civilization. Where would you go?"
"I can't go anywhere. Civilization ended. I'm part of civilization."
"Seriously?"
"What do you expect? The world ends and we can run of to the sunset? Heck no! The world ends! If there was a place for me to go, then the world hasn't ended yet because I can always rebuild. You can't expect the world to end *twice!*"
"So it's all over, then?"
"Yep."
"..."
"..."
"..."
"Well, I might go to Disney World. That's a different world."

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577d5de6368724709003743#post_5577d5de6368724709003743
They lost their traditional market for their products and they suddenly find themselves competing with more optimized or "evolved" western firms. That proved too much for them when they opened up. They lost their food source. And in turn, they get eaten up by foreign companies or were left to rot.
Businesses are in a way, like organisms.
